isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1995) - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - TOOLS - GAUGE BAR TOOL (PS94-831-3)

svcsubproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcsubproc.para:
Gauge Bar Tool ( Figure 5.13)
can be used to measure intake manifold (Boost) pressure, fuel pressure, air cleaner intake restriction, fuel restriction, exhaust restriction and crankcase pressure.
Gauge (1), 0-30 psi gauge, may be used to measure fuel pressure or intake manifold (Boost) pressure.
The compound Gauge (2), (0-30 in. Hg. vacuum) and (0-30 psi) may be used to measure fuel system inlet restriction, fuel pressure or intake manifold (Boost) pressure.
The 0-60 inches of water (magnehelic) gauge (0-2.16 psi), may be used to measure air cleaner restriction or crankcase pressure.

note.para: When using the magnehelic gauge, be sure to plug the test line into the proper ("Pressure" or "Vacuum") port.

svcsubproc.para: Gauge (5), 0-100 psi gauge may be used to check fuel pressure.
Gauge (6), 0-30 psi gauge with a built in regulator may be used to check wastegate actuator movement.

svcsubproc.title: OPERATING INSTRUCTIONS
svcsubproc.para: Connect test lines between the gauge ports on the Gauge Bar and the test points shown on the (REAR SIDE) of HART START NO START AND PERFORMANCE DIAGNOSTIC FORM EGED-150.
